column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Yakone .
#Text=I 'll be back one day to claim it .
#Text=" Yakone says : " This time I 'm gon na put you to sleep for good !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm taking away your bending , for good .
#Text=It 's over .
#Text=" Korra says : " Aang ... this whole time ... you were trying to warn me about Tarrlok .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " My life is a disaster now , thanks to you .
#Text=" Korra says : " So your little bloodbending secret 's out ?
#Text=And I know how you bloodbent me without a full moon .
#Text=You 're Yakone 's son .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I was his son , but in order to win Republic City , I had to become someone else .
#Text=My father failed because he tried to rule the city from its rotten underbelly .
#Text=My plan was perfect .
#Text=I was to be the city 's savior .
#Text=But you , you ruined everything !
#Text=" Korra says : " Tarrlok , the jig is up and you have nowhere to go .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Oh no .
#Text=No , I 'll escape and start a new life .
#Text=And you 're coming as my hostage .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 'll never get away with this !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Amon !
#Text="
